channel.title: Webclient/Jar Help Please
channel.description: So im trying to make this 317 downloadable that I have and when I jarmaker it so its a jar file it wont open, on the original i right click the run to check the main class and its client, I enter that in to the manifest but when it makes the jar i click it and it wont open when i click that bat file that i made also it says it cant find main class client but i know its there, idk why the jar wont open when i click it any1 have a idea?

item.title: Webclient/Jar Help Please
